title.bibl: Saloniki-Greek Press, Jan. 27, 1923. From the Chicago Greek Consulate

div.bibl: Saloniki, Jan. 27, 1923. FROM THE CHICAGO GREEK CONSULATE

body.p: P.1--The Chicago Greek consulate wishes to request of those persons within the district, which it serves who hold temporary certificates of the sixteen hundred-million-drachma forced loan that by the end of February, 1923, they will present these certificates at the Greek consulate and receive in exchange for them their permanent bonds.
The office of the consul general.
